.2s}.swiper-slide-active{filter:blur(0)!important;transform:scale(1)!important}.swiper__tools{position:relative;display:flex;flex-direction:column-reverse;gap:2rem;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;padding:2rem button:first-of-type{transform:rotate(180deg)}.swiper__buttons button:hover{background-color:#a600ff}.swiper-pagination{position:relative;left:40%;display:none;transform:translateX(-50%)}@media
